price: 4. Dan pada penciptaan dirimu dan pada makhluk bergerak yang bernyawa yang bertebaran (di bumi) terdapat tanda-tanda (kebesaran Allah) untuk kaum yang meyakini,
arabic: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wafī khalqikum wamā yabuthu min dābbatin āyātun liqawmin yūqinūna
